commit_msg:
Merge pull request #295 from QFer/fix/option_decompose_toffoli

Toffoli Decomposition Option MA should be AM
author_comment: The Toffoly gate was wrongly represented by "MA" string, instead of "AM". Therefore the test code never called that toffoli related decomposition. Reporter: "the option is read and checked against "AM" and then the function toff_kernel.controlled_cnot_AM is called. Because the option enabled was "MA" this decomposition was never called."
